title: [SOLVED]820-2915 not running from AC Charger
message:
Hi guys, i have a 2915 that runs on battery, green and orange light but on AC only it shows green light and no fan. Few measurement without battery:

PPBUS_G3H    12.62
PP3V42_G3H  3.469
PP5V_S5   0v
R7005 = 20 ohm
R7021  = 10ohm
R7022 = 10ohm

No short to ground on any of the U7000 pins. Any ideas?

Greetz
Arno

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 not running from AC Charger
message: i think you need to investigate the pp5v_s5 issue.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 not running from AC Charger
message: Using a REAL APPLE 85W charger will usually help......

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 not running from AC Charger
message: Im using original apple charger, that works with another mac.... im not that big of a noob.... but a noob nevertheless

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 not running from AC Charger
message: you need pp5v_s5 for this machine to power on. I would inspect U7201 to make sure this chip is functioning properly( voltage in, enable signals)

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 not running from AC Charger
message: If it works on the battery then this has nothing to do with U7201 and everything to do with the SMC not telling it to turn on. What do you measure on SMC_ADAPTER_EN with battery unplugged and charger plugged in?

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 not running from AC Charger
message: Reflowing SMC fixed the issue thanks guys!
